text: Everyone who has ever been drunk, drink 1 sip.
${player}, if you've ever sent a text to the wrong person, drink 2 sips. If not, give 2 sips.
Everyone with blue eyes, drink 1 sip.
Everyone must say their favorite drink. ${player} chooses the best one, and that person drinks.
${player}, drink as many sips as your age divided by 10, rounded up.
Everyone who has been outside the country drinks 2 sips.
${player}, you're the thumb master until the next question. Whenever you put your thumb on the table, the last person to do the same drinks.
Rock, paper, scissors between ${player} and the person to their right. Loser drinks 2 sips.
Everyone who has a sibling, drink 1 sip.
${player}, close your eyes. Everyone votes if you should drink. Majority wins.
Never have I ever... gone skinny dipping. Drink if you have.
${player}, you're the rule maker. Make a rule that everyone must follow until the end of the game. Anyone who breaks it drinks 2 sips.
